summary: Reworks the Requiem Smithing perk tree a bit, removing and replacing requirements.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b]Requiem - Smithing Unchained[/b][/size]



[color=#ff0000][size=4]IMPORTANT![/size][/color]
This mod is currently superseded by [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69587/?]USE-ME - Ultimate Skyrim Experience - Maximum Edition[/url][/b] by [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8411732]UnmeiX[/url][/b].
Inside the Files section you will find an optional file ([b]SPR - Smithing Perks Reqtified[/b]) that does mostly what this mod does but retains the "anvil-like" perk tree look.



Reworks the Requiem Smithing perk tree a bit, removing and replacing requirements.

[list]
[*][b]Orcish Smithing[/b] only requires [b]Craftmanship[/b].

[*][b]Elven Smithing[/b] only requires [b]Craftmanship[/b].

[*][b]Legendary Blacksmithing[/b] only requires [b]Advanced Blacksmithing[/b].

[*][b]Ebony Smithing[/b] only requires [b]Advanced Blacksmithing[/b].

[*][b]Glass Smithing[/b] only requires [b]Advanced Blacksmithing[/b].

[*][b]Draconic Blacksmithing[/b] only requires [b]Advanced Blacksmithing[/b].

[/list]
All other requirements (skill level, books) are still unchanged.

[size=4]Load order[/size][list]
[*]<Other mods>
[*]Requiem
[*]<Requiem patches>
[*][color=#ff0000][b]Requiem - Smithing Unchained (this mod)[/b][/color]
[*]Alternate Start - Live Another Life
[*]Requiem for the Indifferent
[/list]

[size=4]Installation[/size]
Add and activate the Requiem - Smithing Unchained.esp file.
It is completely safe to add the plugin mid-game.

[size=4]Uninstallation[/size]
Deactivate and/or delete the Requiem - Smithing Unchained.esp file.
It is completely safe to remove the plugin mid-game.
author: sh0uzama

files.name: Requiem - Smithing Unchained
files.changelogHtml: First test version. Bugs in the perks texture background.
